xxl.core.io.converters

Class SizeConverter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.io.converters.Converter<T>
      • xxl.core.io.converters.SizeConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the object that can be converted by using this converter.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanArrayConverter, ByteArrayConverter, CharacterArrayConverter, DoubleArrayConverter, FixedSizeConverter, FloatArrayConverter, IntegerArrayConverter

    public abstract class SizeConverter<T>
extends Converter<T>
    This abstract class represents a special kind of converter which provides a method which returns the size of an object in bytes before doing the serialization.
    See Also:
    Converter, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SizeConverter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getSerializedSize(T object)
      Returns the number of bytes used for serialization/deserialization of a special object.

      • SizeConverter

        public SizeConverter()

    • Method Detail

      • getSerializedSize

        public int getSerializedSize(T object)
        Returns the number of bytes used for serialization/deserialization of a special object. This method should be overwritten to become performant.
        Parameters:
        object - the object of which the size is returned.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes.
